scenes.title: Homepage Exploration
scenes.narration: Welcome to YouTube's homepage! Let's explore the content. You can see the search bar, trending videos, and recommended channels. Let's click on a trending video.

scenes.title: Video Player
scenes.narration: Here's the video playing! You can see the title, description, and other details. Let's interact with the player controls. We can pause, adjust volume, and switch to full screen.

scenes.title: Liking and Commenting
scenes.narration: We can interact with the video by liking it and adding a comment. See the like button and the comment section? Let's click on them and input a comment.

coverage: This demo covers the homepage exploration, playing a video, interacting with the player, and showing how to like a video and post a comment.
assumptions: The user is assumed to have a basic understanding of web navigation and player controls.
risks: The video chosen for the demo might not be available in all regions or could be age-restricted.

segments.text: Welcome to YouTube, a vast platform filled with videos and music. The homepage offers a glimpse of trending content, making exploration easy.
Let's dive into the world of viral content! We'll click on this trending video which takes us to an exciting destination.
The video begins playing, and we're immersed in the content. Controls are easily accessible, allowing us to pause, adjust, and enjoy the show.
Want to show some love? We can like the video and join the conversation by commenting. It's a simple and engaging process!
